A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Supremely disappointing.  A few enjoyable high points were completely destroyed by the inappropriate slap stick comedy & completely confused & thin dead end plot.  The clear attempt by RJ & Lucasfilm to prostitute & ultimately sacrifice SW canon & lore for a meta-version that they could congratulate themselves & proclaim that they succeeded in killing SW to create a Newer-Age version more to their liking.  The joyful willingness in dragging Luke's legacy down to a paranoid coward attempting to kill his nephew in his sleep only to whimper away into the Force void is tantamount to a High Crime.  This is the fatal flaw w/ Kathy Kennedy/Lucasfilm's (et al) attempt to remake SW in their own Leftist Regressive image that they have so many spinning plates advancing their agenda that they have completely lost sight of & destroyed the Myth & lore that made SW magical.
